verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Moyo wangu funguka
moyo wangu funguka
iye iye iyelelele iye
moyo wangu funguka
moyo wangu funguka. x2
Kufuli la moyo legea kidogo
ili Bwana Yesu aingie moyoni. x2

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Wataka kitu gani wewe moyo
(ili ufunguke)
Bwana Yesu apate kuingia (leo)
moyo moyo moyo wangu funguka,
ni imbe wimbo gani wewe moyo
(ili ufunguke),
Bwana Yesu apate kuingia (leo)
moyo moyo moyo wangu funguka.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nionee huruma wewe moyo
moyo wangu tulia kwa Yesu
moyo wangu moyo funguka.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Fungua masikio wewe moyo
Bwana Yesu anabisha hodi hodi
hodi moyo funguka.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
kwenye uvungu wako
wewe moyo vumbi limetawala moyoni
ufisadi ushirikina.
